options.query: {{`DELETE FROM tenant_access WHERE tenantid ='` + components.table1.selectedRow.tenantid + `' AND email='` + components.table1.selectedRow.email + `'`}};
{{'INSERT INTO tenant_access(tenantid, email) VALUES ' + Object.values(components.table1.newRows).map(dataUpdate =>`('` + dataUpdate.tenantid + `', '` + dataUpdate.email + `')`)}};
